prompts: Create a powerful water-type Pokemon with sharp teeth and vibrant scales.
I want to see a crocodile-inspired Pokemon that has bright blue skin and fierce red spikes.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a giant alligator but has a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon with an agile body, reminiscent of both land and water environments.
Imagine a Pokemon that can easily blend into wetlands and is known for its strength.
Design a creature that can swim swiftly and has an intimidating yet friendly demeanor.
Show me a final evolution of a water-type Pokemon that dominates in aquatic battles.
